attributes.action: Nick Clegg should resign his post as Deputy Prime Minister.
attributes.additional_details:
Nick Clegg is upholding another right wing Tory Government following the dreadful Thatcher era.

David Cameron is continuing where Margaret Thatcher left off in 1997, ie rolling back the State and attacking the welfare State under cover of reducing the deficit.

The Tories do not have a mandate for this.  Nick Clegg should resign.
